text:
Stardog | Machine Learning Software Engineer, Senior Distributed Database Engineer, Senior Front End Engineer | Arlington, VA, Boston, MA, or REMOTE | http://stardog.com

Stardog is the world's leading Knowledge Graph platform for the Enterprise. It lets you query, search, and analyze enterprise data, wherever it is, using scalable, cutting-edge Knowledge Graph technology.

We're hiring:

Machine Learning Software Engineer - NLP, Deep Learning, Probabilistic Graphical Models - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/stardogcom/view/P_AA...

Senior Distributed Database Engineer - Graph Algorithms, Distributed Indexes, Query Evaluation - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/stardogcom/view/P_AA...

Senior Front End Engineer - Javascript, Node, React - https://hire.withgoogle.com/public/jobs/stardogcom/view/P_AA...
